name: Landmark Colonial Support
description: Request immediate logistical support from Landmark Colonial operations. Gain access to colony facilities and equipment for one mission.

name: Colony Militia Backup
description: Call in additional militia units for support. Gain allied NPC support during one encounter.

name: Engineering Support
description: Access to Chief Engineer Fielding's workshop and technical expertise. Gain bonus to repair actions and equipment modifications.

name: Forest Navigation Intel
description: Detailed terrain maps and local knowledge from colony scouts. Gain immunity to difficult terrain in forest environments for one mission.

name: Colony Supply Cache
description: Access to colony emergency supplies and ammunition stores. Restore 1 charge to all LIMITED systems during rest.

name: Surveillance Network
description: Access to colony sensor networks and surveillance systems. Gain detailed intelligence about one upcoming encounter.

name: Emergency Medical
description: Priority access to colony medical facilities and staff. Gain enhanced healing and medical support during downtime.

name: Defensive Preparations
description: Pre-positioned defensive equipment and fortifications. Begin next combat encounter with favorable terrain or cover.

name: Communication Priority
description: Priority access to colony communication systems. Gain bonus to coordination and command actions during missions.

name: Rapid Response
description: Access to colony transport vehicles and rapid deployment systems. Gain enhanced mobility options for one mission.
